title: News24.com | Man arrested for allegedly printing, selling fraudulent essential service permits
description: A 41-year-old man from Diepkloof in Soweto was arrested during a sting operation for allegedly printing fraudulent essential service permits.
content:
A 41-year-old man from Diepkloof in Soweto was arrested during a sting operation on Wednesday morning for allegedly printing fraudulent essential service permits.
According to a statement by the Gauteng Department of Community Safety, Gauteng Traffic Police … [+1238 chars]
